scripts.lib-vmajor: git stash && cd projects/bespunky/angular-zen && (for /F %m in ('npm version major') do git commit --all -m "Bumped library version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.lib-vminor: git stash && cd projects/bespunky/angular-zen && (for /F %m in ('npm version minor') do git commit --all -m "Bumped library version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.lib-vpatch: git stash && cd projects/bespunky/angular-zen && (for /F %m in ('npm version patch') do git commit --all -m "Bumped library version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.app-vmajor: git stash && (for /F %m in ('npm version major --no-git-tag-version') do git commit --all -m "Bumped workspace version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.app-vminor: git stash && (for /F %m in ('npm version minor --no-git-tag-version') do git commit --all -m "Bumped workspace version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.app-vpatch: git stash && (for /F %m in ('npm version patch --no-git-tag-version') do git commit --all -m "Bumped workspace version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.vmajor: npm run lib-vmajor && npm run app-vmajor
scripts.vminor: npm run lib-vminor && npm run app-vminor
scripts.vpatch: npm run lib-vpatch && npm run app-vpatch
